title: Toptuber
subtitle: Toptuber is a project dedicated to helping YouTubers to manage their channel and improve SEO on their videos.

title: SpecsSphere
subtitle: Luxury sunglasses providing website
features: A luxury sunglasses providing website with dashboard and ordering system.
Different Dashboard interface for admin and non admin user.
With Express JS backend with mongodb database.
Admin has order access and status change ability
Admin can make others admin and add product and delete product.

title: SEO Tools App
subtitle: Seo tools are a combination of tools designed to help YouTubers to boost their SEO.

title: Tutor Karigor
subtitle: An application that will act as a network for a better exposure for tutor and a great tutor finding experience for guardian and media.

title: Somadhan
subtitle: An issue tracker service
features: An issue tracking service system.
Admin can create account and maintain issues.
User can create issues and see the issue development
User admin can communicate directly through chat when the issue is active
Easy change and monitoring of issue states

title: DiabeticNet
subtitle: A network and specialize services for diabetic patients
features: Provides different services related to diabetes specific education.
Provide specialized product diabetic patients.
Blogs related to diabetes help to educate and make a community.
It provides services related to diabetes related product delivery.
A community for diabetic patient.

title: Eideticho
subtitle: An echo of your memories
features: Eideticho is a simple app that acts as your Eidetic or photographic memory.
User Authentication and simple online photographic memory note storage for each user.
Save All the memories in each user timeline view.
Everyday new timeline view and saves the last 30 days memory timeline.
Option to save important memories permanently.

title: EduFit
subtitle: EduFit a fitness education website
features: In the site you can subscribe for different fitness learning courses
Learn about different product we provide.
You can learn about the fitness Instructors
Easy subscription to different courses
You can learn more about EduFit Company.

title: Sylheti Guide
subtitle: An easy Sylheti tour guide booking site
features: A Sylhet tour booking website with tour booking system.
Easy user tour management with easy enrollment and cancelation.
With Express JS backend with mongodb database.
Admin can see others enrollment to set a better tour experience and help you to schedule.
Admin can also add new packages from add package.
